instruction: Analyze this incident scene and select the most appropriate robot from the fleet.
reasoning_chain: Step 1: Identify key incident characteristics - aerial view needed for damage assessment after earthquake
Step 2: Match robot capabilities to requirements - need rapid aerial reconnaissance capability
Step 3: Consider environmental constraints - urban area with collapsed buildings, ground access limited
Step 4: Select optimal robot - Drone provides aerial survey capability with quick deployment
action_plan: 1. Deploy drone for systematic aerial grid survey of affected area. 2. Identify structural damage and access routes. 3. Locate potential survivors and hazards. 4. Report findings to command center for coordinated response.

instruction: Analyze this incident scene and select the most appropriate robot from the fleet.

Step 4: Select optimal robot - Legged robot can navigate rough terrain and reach trapped survivors
